bill_title: transfer funds from the tobacco prevention and reduction trust fund to the general fund.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to transfer funds from the tobacco prevention and reduction trust fund to the general fund. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. The state treasurer shall transfer to the state general fund the sum of one million dollars ($1,000,000), or so much therefor as may be available, from the tobacco prevention and reduction trust fund created pursuant to § 34-46-12. 180 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.052 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
